Description.PlaceHolder: Personalizing notifications with the {strongStartExpName}{strongStartExpName} placeholder is required. Including the sender’s display name using the {strongStartDisName}{strongEndDisName} placeholder is optional.
Description.Placeholder.Instruction: {strongStartExpName}{strongEndExpName} is a placeholder that will insert your experience's name - using this placeholder is required. {strongStartDisName}{strongEndDisName} is a placeholder that will insert the inviter's display name - using this placeholder is optional.

Description.Placeholder.Instruction2: {strongStartDisName}{strongEndDisName} is a placeholder that will insert the inviter's display name - using this placeholder is optional.

Description.Placeholder.InstructionPlaye: For {linkStart}Player Invite Prompts{linkEnd}, {strongStartExpName}{strongEndExpName} is required and {strongStartDisName}{strongEndDisName} is optional. Additional custom placeholders are not supported. The notification's title will automatically include the inviter's name.
Description.Placeholder.InstructionExper: For {linkStart}Experience Notifications{linkEnd}, you can include {strongStartUserIdSuffix}{strongEndUserIdSuffix} as well as any other custom placeholders. The title will automatically be the Experience Name.
Description.Placeholder.ExamplePlayerInv: Example: {strongStartDisName}{strongEndDisName} is inviting you to join {strongStartExpName}{strongEndExpName}!
Description.Placeholder.ExampleExperienc: Example: {strongStartUserIdHighScore}{strongEndUserIdHighScore} beat your high score by {strongStartPoints}{strongEndPoints} points!
